data.title: Noam Chomsky - Age, Family, Bio
data.meta_description: Noam Chomsky: his birthday, what he did before fame, his family life, fun trivia facts, popularity rankings, and more.
data.text:
About

Linguist, philosopher, political activist, and MIT professor who has been called the father of modern linguistics. Many of his theories and social critiques can be found online. At the University of Arizona, he is a laureate professor of linguistics.

Before Fame

He wrote his first article at age ten while attending the Oak Lane Country Day School. The article's ambitious subject was the spread of fascism.

Trivia

He received his B.A., M.A., and Ph.D. from the University of Pennsylvania. His 1955 dissertation was published in 1975 as the groundbreaking work "The Logical Structure of Linguistic Theory."

Family Life

His father, Dr. William Chomsky, was a prominent Hebrew scholar.
